headline: Agoda Unveils Top Destinations for Traditional Music Lovers this International Music Day
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda reveals a curated guide to exploring Asia's rich tapestry of traditional music to mark International Music Day on October 1st. From the rhythmic beats of Indian folk music to the harmonious melodies of Vietnamese court music, Asia offers a diverse range of musical experiences that captivate travelers seeking to immerse themselves in local culture.
